item.title: Google Summer of Code: The pressure is on!
item.dc:creator: Swapnil Sharma
item.description: It’s exam time!The classes are off and all I have to do is prepare for my final exams. When I wake up, I have no idea whether it is weekday or weekend. All I can say is that the daily dose of morning coffee is working! “Study, eat, sleep repeat” has been my motto for the last one week.https://medium ...READ MORE...

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2018: The build-up
item.dc:creator: Swapnil Sharma
item.description: Things are going great! The coding period has begun and I can see my progress here. I read a research paper on “Phase-resolved spectroscopy of low frequency quasi-periodic oscillations”. It was exciting to learn new concepts.Coming to dealing with real dataset, Abigail Stevens gave me toy kHz, type- ...READ MORE...

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2018: The Beginning
item.dc:creator: Swapnil Sharma
item.description: It’s fair to say that my journey began in the first semester when I was introduced to Astronomy by STAC (the astronomy club of IIT Mandi). There were fewer activities in the club back then, so I used to take the telescope with my friend Indresh Kumar Gupta to explore the universe. Our interest in as ...READ MORE...
